item.description: Movie Night was suggested by Leigh. The movie he recommends is National Treasurer: Book of Secrets. The plot is about how Treasurer Hunter Benjamin Franklin Gates(Nicolas Cage) looks to discover the truth behind the assasination of Abraham Lincoln, by uncovering the 18 pages missing from the diary of assassin John Wilkes Booth. Leigh says the first National Treasure movie was real good. I am going to have to make sure I see the first one on rental before I see the sequel! For more info on the movie please go to www.cinemark.com. For those interested we can grab a beer and a bite to eat after at the Northampton Brewery.
item.name: Movie Night
